alert.text: Now qualified in infection control and prevention

left.title: Professional, Experienced Chimney Sweep
left.text: Manual sweeps, power sweeps, camera inspections, and more. Our services are varied, but all come with the same promise of quality, dedication and durability. Licensed, insured and over 10 years of experience. I guarantee my work, as well as offering free estimates.

right.title: Schedule Appointment
right.text: All estimates are free and flexible. No hidden charges. No up selling.

right.title: Covering 20 miles around Bath
right.text: Based in Bath, we cover a 20 mile radius, including Bristol, Chippenham, Trowbridge and more.
